Posts.Content: Dec 8, 2014 10:05AM Michelle1103 wrote: Thank you all for the support. I am still in shock. I just went in for a regular check up and was told I need to have a mammogram because I am over 40. I'm not sure what kind or stage yet. I see the oncologist tommorrow. My surgeon wants me to have gene testing to show that I need a bi-lateral masectomy instead of just having one breast removed.
